ibis.poolInfo
Class PoolInfo

java.lang.Object
  ibis.poolInfo.PoolInfo

public class PoolInfo
extends Object

The PoolInfo class provides a utility for finding out information about the nodes involved in a closed-world run. The PoolInfo class depends on the ibis.pool.size property, which must contain the total number of hosts involved in the run. This property can be set either as a system property, or in the ibis.properties config file.
